content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Muller. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a budget of 1000 Euros per month.

I would like to know if this is possible for this apartment.

I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I would like to negotiate the rental price.

Thank you.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your response, Mr. Muller. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your willingness to negotiate the rental price.

Based on the information you provided, I believe that a rental price of 1000 Euros per month could be possible for this apartment. However, I would like to clarify that the final rental price will depend on various factors, including the length of the lease, any additional fees or charges, and any concessions that may be made during the negotiation process.

That being said, I am open to discussing the rental price with you in more detail and working together to find a mutually agreeable solution. I value your dependability and responsibility as a tenant and would be happy to have you on board.

Is there a specific time and date that works best for you to continue the negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am available tomorrow at 2:00 PM.

Thank you for your understanding.

I would like to accept the rental price of 1000 Euros per month.

I am looking forward to moving in.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Max Müller
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your prompt response, Mr. Muller. I am glad to hear that you are interested in accepting the rental price of 1000 Euros per month for this apartment. I appreciate your interest in the property and your willingness to move forward with the negotiation process.

I am happy to confirm that the rental price of 1000 Euros per month is agreed upon, and I look forward to welcoming you as a new tenant. The lease agreement will be prepared and sent to you for review and signature at your earliest convenience.

If you have any additional questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I am here to help and ensure a smooth transition for both of us.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine
